pros: None at all and thats a fact.

pros: Good team atmosphere providing your face fits
cons: Bullying from senior staff who openly talk about other staff. Regularly ageist comments regarding other people. No control of teams by housing managers who like to stay out of the office as much as possible. Staff allowed to ‘wing it’ and if they get it wrong they are blamed. Incredibly toxic and unsupported company who turn a blind eye to bullying and prejudice and allow employees who are ‘liked’ to get away with bad behaviours. Had a thoroughly bad experience working there and would advise anyone to think carefully about applying for jobs.

review_title: Great place to work, management could be better
pros: Working hours - 35 hours a week, can start at 10am and do your 7 hours. Private healthplan (SimplyHealth), free parking on some sites. Discount portal for shopping. Pay is great. Great office in Didsbury, with staff that are nice.
cons: Fast paced always changing things, need to adapt to that environment, where staff want things done yesterday.
